ComicInfo.Summary:
Jesus is forcibly inscribed into the Armed Forces after being seen walking around in his robe.
Unable to buy any junk food because he's short on cash, Fat Freddy gets into a violent withdrawal state. The Bros. decide to pull a heist on a grocery store in order to get Freddy some food.
A pair of crows steal Ackley's eyes.
The police control board pull a prank on Tricky.
Five soldiers meet their untimely end in this anti-war story.
A group of soldiers transform to armadillos after being ordered to go “at ease.”
The Emperor of Uranus sends his army to invade Earth after he hears that it's being riddled by conservationists.
An armadillo grows on a cop's head and consumes him.
Lenore and the commandos barge into a gathering of intellectuals to make a statement on female liberation.
A satirical paranoid rant from Crumb, as he suspects fumes from his ink bottle is actually poison gas planted by a government agent.
Lester Prong from the Comics Code Authority is attacked by zombies who have risen from the sewer.
